text: Daniela Mercuri de Almeida (born July 28, 1965), known by her stage name Daniela Mercury, is a Brazilian singer, songwriter and record producer. She is one of the best known Brazilian female singers, selling over 20 million albums worldwide. ==Early life== Mercury was born on July 28, 1965,Daniela Mercury biography. Internet Movie Database. in Salvador, Bahia. Her mother is Liliana Mercuri, a social workerBiography at official website . of Italian descent.Birchmeier, Jason. [ Daniela Mercury biography]. All Music Guide. Her father is António Fernando de Abreu Ferreira de Almeida, a Portuguese-born industrial mechanic. Her four siblings include Tom, Cristiana, Vânia, and Marcos. She attended both the Ana Néri School and the Colégio Baiano. When Mercury was eight years old, she began taking dance lessons,.Biography . Cravo Albin Dictionary of Brazilian Popular Music. At age 13, influenced by Elis Regina, she decided to become a singer. She started singing in local bars in 1980. Mercury went to the Universidade Federal da Bahia, where she enrolled in the Dance School in 1984. A year later she married electronic engineer Zalther Póvoas.Botelho, Thaís and Blanes, Simone.
